actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the energy percentage of the investment tax credit for qualified intercity buses through December 31, 1990.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the energy percentage of the investment tax credit for qualified intercity buses from December 31, 1985, to December 31, 1990.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the energy percentage of the investment tax credit for qualified intercity buses through December 31, 1990.
